definition: government office in feudal China/yamen
office/yamen 衙門|衙门
surname Ya

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
surname Men
the Qing dynasty equivalent of the Foreign Office
lit. the yamen is strong as iron, the officials flow like water (idiom)/fig. government officials come and go
pinyin: tie3 da3 de5 ya2 men5 , liu2 shui3 de5 guan1

sentences.english: And the soldiers led him away into the hall, called Praetorium; and they call together the whole band.
sentences.chinese: 兵丁把耶穌帶進衙門院裏，叫齊了全營的兵。

sentences.english: Jesus said, "My kingdom is not of this world."
sentences.chinese: 衆人將耶穌從該亞法那裏往衙門內解去。

sentences.english: The only one ancient county government saved so completely, which was built in Yuan dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 全國唯一保存完整的郡府級衙門，始建於元朝。

sentences.english: Get prepared, Moncler Uomo Gilet, the Ya gate there also arrived.
sentences.chinese: 準備好了，衙門那邊也到了。

sentences.english: 16The soldiers led Jesus away into the palace (that is, the Praetorium) and called together the whole company of soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 兵丁把耶穌帶進衙門院裏，叫齊了全營的兵。

sentences.english: But sometime earlier, it was a Yamen.
sentences.chinese: 但是最早以前這可是一座衙門。

sentences.english: Private advisers in ancient times were people who helped officials deal with documents and letters.
sentences.chinese: 古時衙門裏的師爺是幫助官員做文案工作的人。

sentences.english: This was the Northern Navy commander's office, or commonly known as the Navy Yamen.
sentences.chinese: 這兒就是當年的北洋水師提督署，俗稱水師衙門。

sentences.english: Taijing School is located in the Nhorth-west Back Street of Yamenkou Village , Shijingshan District.
sentences.chinese: 臺京學校位於石景山區衙門口村西南后街。

sentences.english: Yin Changchun stayed with the Yamen.
Admiral Yamen is 200 meters outside the Southwest Admiral Ding Yu's apartment.
sentences.chinese: 提督衙門外西南200米處是水師提督丁汝昌的寓所。

sentences.english: The bureaucratic style of work must be dropped.
